element.definition: Abstinence or reduction from some or all food, drink, or both, for a period of time prior to sample collection.
element.comment: Representing fasting status using this element is preferred to representing it with an observation using a 'pre-coordinated code'  such as  LOINC 2005-7 (Calcium [Moles/â€‹time] in 2 hour Urine --12 hours fasting), or  using  a component observation ` such as `Observation.component code`  = LOINC 49541-6 (Fasting status - Reported).

binding.description: Codes describing the fasting status of the patient.
